SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_REGISTEREDCHILDCOUNT
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Total Number of children registered to a child project
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_REGISTEREDCHILDCOUNT(@CHILDPROJECTID uniqueidentifier) returns smallint with execute as caller as begin declare @registeredChildrenCount smallint; select @registeredChildrenCount = count(so.ID) from sponsorshipopportunity so join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION sl on so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID = sl.ID where so.ELIGIBILITYCODE in (0,1) -- Pending, Eligible and sl.FIELDOFFICEID = @CHILDPROJECTID ;
return @registeredChildrenCount; end
